alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Williamson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 2:10PM CDT until July 02 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Williamson County in southern Illinois... Southeastern Jackson County in southern Illinois... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 209 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Carbondale, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carbondale, Herrin, Murphysboro, Carterville, De Soto, Crainville, Cambria, Energy, Hurst, Bush, Williamson County Regional Airport and Colp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
